website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary look for homes with modern decor.
cons: At 22 inches tall, it’s shorter than some other models

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp and is very stable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tp holder for a while now. It looks sharp and is very stable. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: ModGirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice stand. It's just heavy enough that I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stand. It's just heavy enough that I don't have to worry about it tipping while rolling off TP. Simple assembly and done within minutes. Note: it doesn't hold any more than 1 roll at a time. Well worth the price. Many other free standing holders are just not heavy enough. I've had it for two months and no discoloration. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OleanderMoon

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this holder and it is very sturdy, but after 2 months of use there were rust spots on the base and they keep getting worse over time. It is unsightly and I will need to replace it already. Sadly, I feel like I’ve wasted my money. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janean Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: It was slightly defective. The screw end was a bit crooked and I was afraid it would tilt, but a bit of fixing and it was okay. I like the design, especially the shape of the bottom plate. It takes up very little space and it just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jenco

customer_reviews.title: Total fail over a 4 month period
customer_reviews.text: This was so not worth it. After two months, I had to superglue the TP “arm” to the metal piece that extended from the base, which then worked for another few months. But after another two months, it all fell apart. Not from over-use though, because this was in a second bathroom that was hardly used, and I’m pretty sure none of my guests karate-chopped it. It’s just poorly constructed. I won’t buy this again and now I am on the hunt for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw, will break soon
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my house, 2 out of the 3 started wobbling, and eventually the top part came off. There's no way to reattach once loose because the small thread and nut are rattling around inside the two tubes. No way to reach the company either. Only lasted 3 months. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality, sleek modern style
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, significant weight keeps tissue stand in place. Sleek, modern style... liked that product did NOT offer spare tissue holder. True brushed nickel finish, goes well with existing bathroom hardware. Recommend facing open end away from you to prevent tissue roll from spinning off rod.... this doesn't appear to be an issue tho makes sense should user have an aggressive spin ;-). Fast shipping, good protective packaging. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! Great for a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: With limited wall space due to a pocket door, we needed to find an alternative to a wall-mounted TP holder. This is absolutely perfect and looks great! It's sturdy and took all of about 30 seconds to put together (it's necessary to attach the base). It's not flimsy at all and does not fall over when the TP is pulled. It's also nice to have the flexibility of moving it around if desired. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality, packaging was great and delivered in great ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality, packaging was great and delivered in great shape. Easy to put together and looks great. Not sure why some review say the base isn't substantial enough....all I can think is they the are pulling from a great distance or height - it is stable and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Askew
customer_reviews.text: When assembled, the base does not align properly with the holder. The design is all right angles, so I expected the paper holder would run parallel to the edges of the base, but it is maybe 20-30% off. It probably doesn’t impact function, but looks odd. Because of the way this fits together, the offending element is embedded in the base, so it does not appear to be adjustable. I won’t bother to return it, but probably won’t consider another product from this company. Their quality process shouldn’t have let this out the door.
customer_reviews.author: never mind

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability- broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The horizontal bar loosened and eventually fell off. There is no way to tighten and/or fix it. I love the look, but it has lasted less than one year. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but that is only the look. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy but at the same time looks sleek and modern. Should last and still Look great for years. Well it is just a few months later and I am revising my review to say how extremely disappointed we are with this item. It won’t even stand up straight anymore. One has to lean it against a wall for it to stand up and not fall over. Would never repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Susieke

customer_reviews.title: Solves TP shortage problem—for now
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy good-looking toilet paper holder which efficiently holds the large rolls of paper I purchased earlier this month: Scott Essential Jumbo Roll JR. Commercial Toilet Paper (67805), 100% Recycled Fiber, 2-PLY, White, 12 Rolls / Case, 1000' / Roll. Yes, it’s two-ply are light-weight (not Charmin for sure) although soft enough, but it does the job quite adequately. We’re living in a small town in Central California, so shortages of everything are a reality. Also at 75 plus years, with several risky health issues and still rising case numbers, we prefer not to go foraging around for necessities. This stand and the jumbo rolls work for us. Amazon to the rescue.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Is this a TP holder for ants?!
customer_reviews.text: The design and pictures look great but this is about 75% of what you’re expecting. The roll holder is a full rolls’ width lower than where you’d expect it to be. I don’t know how tall toilets are where this stand came from, but unless you’re sitting on the floor, you’ll be looking around for this stand. Also it feels extremely flimsy. I could hear chrome flaking off as I gently tightened the single bolt that holds this all together. Based on other reviews I don’t expect this to be my last encounter with the bolt. For the price, I should have just bought a cheap welder and made my own.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I rent an apartment that looks good everywhere except the bathroom. The ceramic toilet paper holder was placed in a non-sensical spot, therefore the tenant previously left a freestanding toilet paper holder. It was rusty, loose, bent up and super ugly. I hesitated buying this even thoughts $24 unsure whether or not I "needed" it but I have to say that it was worth the money to spruce up the bathroom. It was easy to assemble and I've had it for a few months. So far, it's sturdy and holding up pretty well. It also makes my bathroom look less ugly. I'd post a picture but I'm embarrassed of the hideous tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Learna21

customer_reviews.title: Product defect?
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and I was hopeful. There are some great reviews on this product. I think that some of the not-great reviews may be due to an assembly issue--perhaps some fit together perfectly and voila a terrific stand. The one we received, the connection between the base and stand is a rectangular screw/nut--with too much "wiggle room." It simply would not function well. If you happen to receive one that has a great connection/fit, I think it is likely a great product--ours did not and we had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: tba

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice, both fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly assembled. Purchased once, returned and purchased again in hopes that first was an assembly error, but on second day of use the second purchase also fell apart. Horizontal bar is poorly secured. Unstable and flawed finish.
customer_reviews.author: AddiEm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice and heavy base
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, nice and heavy base, and attractive. Very nice brushed nickel finish. No issues with roll coming off, if that happens just turn it 180 degrees so you're pulling towards the bar, not the opening :) Very happy with my purchase, great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, went together in 30 seconds. sturdy and attractive but shorter than old one
customer_reviews.text: If you've bought just about anything that's replacing a purchase from years ago, you'lve probably noticed a trend: shrinkage. After all, less materials means higher profits. But while that's disappointing compared to the one we're replacing, it's still taller than many alternatives on Amazon. So nice to see sturdy construction, thoughtful design and easy assembly. Manufacturer: one suggestion, make nut recess a bit more so the top doesn't move and stays in place. (Amazon, why do you list "softness" as a feature here? )
customer_reviews.author: gailaz

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The rental I moved into didn't have a toilet paper holder, so this product worked great. Very sturdy. Was simple to assemble. Looks great in bathroom. Fits well between the toilet and counter. Only downfall is that the base has gotten a little bit of rust on it. I assumed that would happen, because the majority of bathroom products that are available in stainless steel, are actually stainless steel mixed with other metals. Makes products a more reasonable price for consumers. (My dad works with true stainless steel and he told me this little tid-bit about metals.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Just the modern toilet paper stand I was expecting. I like the rectangle design. It’s refreshing to see after 12 years of the traditional circle base. This stand is lightweight yet sturdy and stable. I like how easy the toll replacement will be. I’m hoping the roll won’t fall easily. I changed the location to one where less accidents (kids/adults bumping into it) are likely to happen. The price is more than I wanted to pay (compared to the $6 I paid at Ross for the ones that lasted over a decade) but I’m hoping this product 100 year warranty means I won’t be replacing it ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Wizel

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND SIMPLE TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: IT’S PERFECT! I like the weight of it. It’s very sturdy, and has a rubber mat under the base so it won’t slide around. It was simple to assemble: one single bolt and washer. It even comes with an Allen wrench so you don’t have to go find a tool! And it does what I bought it for: holds a big/ oversize roll of toilet paper, as you can see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Frank's grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I didn’t know how the whole toilet paper thing was going to work out. When I couldn’t find any locally, back in April, I went online and bought the large rolls in bulk. I didn’t have anything to put them on and found this. It is fantastic! Sturdy, clean lines, and holds the regular rolls and the industrial nightmare rolls perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: npview

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it so much that I bought another for a second bathroom. Good weight so it doesn’t fall over when you pull on the t-paper, good design so the paper doesn’t jump off when you pull it. Simple design, good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Reeni

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We rent in a place that is not so responsive, so when our toilet paper dispenser on the wall was constantly falling and the screws to try to fix it were warped, we just decided to get a free standing holder. This was incredibly easy to put together, and stays upright and holds the toilet paper. So all is well. It was a slight bit lower than I had expected, but that is probably just b/c my parents have one that is higher; the height of this one does not create any issues. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great style and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those rare occasions when you buy something online it looks like it did in the picture and better and it's good quality. Bought this with great hesitation thinking for sure it was going to go back but we're very surprised at the Quality and the finishes. It's also very nice finally not have to be a contortionist to pull the toilet paper off the roll anymore.
customer_reviews.author: always waiting

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this product. I literally received it four weeks ago and it is already rusting. It is simply sitting in my bathroom next to the stool.
customer_reviews.author: northcb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something minimalistic and modern for our remodeled bathroom. I love the simple lines of this holder and the quality of the product. It's very stable, has a nice heavy base that doesn't move and looks great in our bathroom. It takes seconds to assemble and hasn't come loose at any point even though we've had it for quite a while now...very happy with this purchase and a great proce!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Can hold an industrial toilet paper!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. With the pandemic and shortage of toilet paper everywhere, I was forced to buy the industrial type of toilet paper. It doesn't fit in a regular toilet paper holder, so I bought this thing. It's very sturdy and can hold the weight.
customer_reviews.author: TLJO07

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN & QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN, form follows function, minimalist clean lines. The height of the holder is perfect for a high or low toilet; my toilet is high and the TP holder is unobtrusive... it's not a focal point. EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY, the base is solid and doesn't wobble when the tp is rolled off. The satin nickel finish has a perfect soft sheen. Assembly: An L-iron is included, it's the only tool you'll need. I love my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant after reading reviews that said it was wobbly or hard to assemble, but I really loved the look so I took a chance. Very glad I did! It looks just like the photo, very clean and modern, and was brain dead simple to assemble. It looks great, is holding up to regular use, and isn't wobbly or uneven or at all flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Diablita

customer_reviews.title: Is not sturdy (or at least this particular piece was not)
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed to have to review this item negatively. It is a very attractive piece and served its purpose stylishly. However, today the crosspiece that holds the tissue roll fell off and fixing it proved impossible. This piece functioned for only 4 months in a seldom-used guest bathroom, and now it needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a commercial roll of toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: One of the questions answered was if this would hold a commercial sized roll. I first thought it wouldn't because the circle on the end is 1 1/8 inch and the center of the commercial roll is just under an inch and will not slide over the circle like a regular roll of TP will, but the circle will actually unscrew off of the pole and it slides right on. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. MercerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Gets loose and can’t be fixed. Buy a new one every few months.
customer_reviews.text: The top screw grew loose over a few months and you cannot screw it back together because of how it was built. Form over function in this case. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Treb74

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern design and nice narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't seeking the norm free standing multi-roll stand that is common place now. I needed a compact brushed nickel, non-shiny, and current looking stand. This ones provides just that. Very nice brushed finish, holds one roll and doesn't take up any room at all. Stands flat on floor and is just the right height. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tip over
customer_reviews.text: I've had stand up toilet paper holders in the past, and I hated them because they tipped over constantly. Not this one. The bottom is weighted so it stays put. I have 3 young kids and they haven't tipped it over once which I think is saying something! I love the modern look of this too. Overall, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I like this simple plain design and arrived and looked as I had hoped. But I wish it were cheaper to purchase something this simple. I didn't want anything ornate and it costs more to get things that are not ornate. If you want a plain, sturdy toilet paper holder that doesn't take up too much space, this is good.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a TP stand with a narrow base so I could put it as close against the wall as possible. Most stands seem to have a round base, which cannot be put as close to the wall. This stand is sturdy, well-balanced, and has a nice finish (I purchased it in satin nickel). It is exactly what I needed and I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Both of my bathrooms do not have a toilet paper holder attached to the wall. So I bought two of these. They are small enough for my compact bathrooms. They were easy to assemble. They work as intended. You need to wipe the chrome base often to keep it clean and shiny. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AnimalLover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - easy to assemble - base could be a little bit heavier
customer_reviews.text: No problem whatsoever, easy to assemble and beauful. Do make it even better, i would only increase the weight on the base. Other than that.. it is what it is.. it holds your toilet paper :)
customer_reviews.author: AnBu

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish for your bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a hand towel holder. I am tired of the typical counter top towel holders aren't tall enough so your hand towel is sitting partially on the counter top. I have received numerous compliments on how stylish-modern this looks. Very sturdy base with a nice cushion and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan of Free-standing Holders BUT I LOVE THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: I put off purchase for a long time as I’m generally not a fan of free-standing holders, but small bathroom necessitated one. So I gave this purchase A LOT of thought and I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER!! All the things I worried about were absolutely fine: very sturdy base, roll stays on, rectangular shape is perfect for my space, satin nickel looks incredibly nice!! I’m not a “review” person, but just had to take the time to help someone else who may be struggling with this purchase as I was.
customer_reviews.author: CinCin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy AND attractively minimal TP holder for my new bath. This fit the bill nicely. I don't know what all the complaints are about it coming loose from the stand - just tighten it up again. This took me roughly 45 seconds to assemble, and it's stable, easy to use and attractive. Well worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Schwind

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but works
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for my small bathroom. Limited space and needed a toilet paper holder that wouldn’t take up too much room. Fit nicely! It does have some defects though. For the price I expected it to be made better. However, it’s sturdy and easy to put together. You can see in the pic there’s a dent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy, looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had no issue assembling this (took all of 90 seconds), and after a month of use, no issue with it staying together. My three year old uses it daily and it stands up to that test. I do not store extra rolls on it to keep the clean look, so I can’t speak to that use. Nice clean lines and look to it in general. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Resnik

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than expected and doesn't tip over during use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife insisted we not make holes in walls or cabinets in our new home to install a T.P holder. I was apprehensive because I had never seen one of these that would hold up over time and not want to tip over. Surprisingly, this one is great. It is super-simple to assemble, very sturdy, and has plenty of mass to stay still during use. I now own three of them (one for each bathroom).
customer_reviews.author: Leonard S

customer_reviews.title: Modern look
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick to assemble. Adds a sense of modern. Toilet paper slides right onto the pole but doesn't seem to come off easily, unless you want it to. Height is aligned with the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Mk18

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for - pleasing contemporary design, sturdy, easy to assemble. I wanted to keep the guest bath as uncluttered as possible and this TP stand is lovely. It's square corners match the design of the freestanding towel stand very nicely. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AuntMeg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my downstairs bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Came fully assembled. I bought this as a regular toilet paper hanging on my wall was starting to damage the wall. I felt a free standing would look good, and take care of that. It does. Not sure why this asked for softness, it is made of metal, so it is sturdy, not soft.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It is actually very sturdy and looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the base wouldn't be heavy enough, but was surprised upon receiving it. It is actually very sturdy and looks amazing. I wanted something nice and minimal and this was perfect. Definitely a difference between the lower-cost ones that feel lighter and hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby L.

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced durable extremely easy to set up well made product
customer_reviews.text: this is so easy to assemble that I forgot about it until I went to bed and was able to put it up in under 2 minutes from opening the box to putting a toilet paper roll on it. We have used it since with no problems. It seems well-balanced and durable and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: INeedAPublicNameIGuess

customer_reviews.title: ONLY HOLDS 1 TP ROLL AT A TIME!
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar TP holder in my other bathroom and you can move the top part and slide extra rolls. I thought this would be similar to that, but it is not. Cute and serves the purpose, but I would find it more practical if the top part swiveled so you could slide other tp rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica E. King

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Color Are Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The color matches with the brass is our powder perfectly! The price is far better than any other I've seen seen on the web and the quality is almost as good as the $400 one high end hardware store wanted to sell me. I want a well appointed home but it's a toilet paper holder not my bed or a couch.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Comes Apart
customer_reviews.text: Was 5 star. Looks great but came apart. Others posted the same issue. Lifetime guarantee. So, how do I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: LaurieJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality modern tp holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, modern tp holder. It was very easy to assemble and it feels solid. I like the minimalist design. It could be a couple inches taller and I wish the bar holding the tp was a square instead of a cylinder, but overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M/R

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend. Just got it but I think it’s going to work great. Super easy to “assemble.” (I hesitate to use the word because it is one screw!). Toilet paper does not slip off. Bright chrome with no scratches. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt42

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly mess...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 2 days and the pole wobbles where it screws into the base. Tightening the bolt underneath feels snug only until you set it back down. Very disappointed because the design is so cool. I pulled the box out of the trash and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Selection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is very stable and I never feel that it will fall over when I am accessing the toilet paper. It is very attractive and matches my faucets in the sink and shower. It is very flexible in that depending on how you attach the top to the bottom the base can sit in a variety of directions. I'm glad I chose this model. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable. Great TP stand for an all-tile bathroom where I didn't want to drill holes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after redoing our bathroom in 100% tile. Did not want to drill any more holes than necessary for wall-mounted dispensers. The unit seems good quality, stable and does the job. Had it about 3 months now and it's doing great.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: It looks good...until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: It broke in two. In the middle of the night. Nobody was around. Unless it was a ghost. If it's a ghost that has irritable bowel syndrome to the point that it has to break our new toilet paper stand, then I guess I have more worrying problems at hand. Anyway, it broke without anyway of repairing it because the screw actually fell inside the top piece (you can hear it move back and forth. It's kind of pleasant...until you realize it's not supposed to do that).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Classy tp holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Does the job. Discreet and pretty, sturdy and holds the toilet paper just fine. I find the black matte really pretty, everything arrived brand new and high quality, and it looks exactly as described. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: Extra rolls stored nicely
customer_reviews.text: Nice this is the second one I have bought. Previously bought this for our master bath and liked it a lot, so when I decided I needed one for our half bath I bought another. It holds 4 large rolls of TP and doesn’t take up much floor space.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase to put into our preschool son’s bathroom. He kept leaning on the wall holder and finally pulled it off. This is sturdy and he holds 3 extra rolls. No excuse not to replace the empty roll now.
customer_reviews.author: BSN2005

customer_reviews.title: Modern design and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed toilet paper holders for a new construction that I am renting out. As I did not want any drilling to be involved, I was looking for this kind of toilet paper holder stand but wanted one that also looks good and fits this new house's price level and this model was a hit for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and sturdy. Looks really good with my brushed metal bathroom accents. Make sure to keep the fallen key around, you will need to re tighten it a few days after you put it together once the rod and base settle.
customer_reviews.author: Chezare

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for my bathroom. Stand alone, sturdy, easy to put together and price was right. Packaged well. I only purchased one because I wanted to make sure it was what we wanted and it is.
customer_reviews.author: lbowles

customer_reviews.title: ) but I liked the chrome option as satin nickel is everywhere at ...
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected, no complaints. I have had this item for a few months (kids kept pulling the one in the wall out of the wall). As far as how it wears in bathroom humidity is TBD because our pipe broke so the shower situation is non functioning right now (you needed to know that right?) but I liked the chrome option as satin nickel is everywhere at home depot
customer_reviews.author: MMills

customer_reviews.title: necessity
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, perfectly packaged, good, strong base, the answer for small baths
customer_reviews.author: fisherperson

customer_reviews.title: Not that high
customer_reviews.text: The height of this is not ideal. I'm 5 10 and needs to do an effort to reach it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd Had This Years Ago
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This tissue holder stand is the bomb. It's weighted enough to remain upright, and it does what it's supposed to do. There is a metal base at the bottom of the unit and I placed a small trash bin there to conserve space. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive TP holder
customer_reviews.text: I did not wish to display extra rolls of TP on my holder and this looks sleek and modern. I appreciate how steady and heavy the base is as well as the felted bottom. Good value. Great looking!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: When I lifted the bar up to load more toilet paper there was a very sharp edge that cut my finger. Hopefully this was an isolated event and all of them aren't that way. The design is excellent and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Tip Over!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is. But I bought it because it’s sturdy and doesn’t tip over like some other models. Looks fairly contemporary in style, but clean lines will fit in various decor
customer_reviews.author: Steppytoe

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts to this item
customer_reviews.text: -I gave it a one star review for assembly because I’m missing a part. I ordered two of the toilet paper stands, but one of them is missing the Allen wrench screw and washer. How can I get replacements for those missing parts
customer_reviews.author: RobtSal

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I received this last week to use in a remodeled bathroom. I didn't want my kids to pull the toilet paper holder out of the wall like they have done in the past. This is the perfect solution. I hope it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased commercial toilet paper. This stand holds it perfectly. I love this product so much that I purchased another one. Great value, great quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Confusing but quality. Don't expect communication from company.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent product but I ran into an issue and tried to contact the company that makes it and received no response. The issue was I thought for some reason that you were supposed to screw off the knob on the end of the part that holds the toilet paper but you don't need to do that because it won't come off without using vice grips and toilet paper rolls will fit on over it. Don't make that mistake and it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I put it together it is not straight. The tubing that holds the toilet paper roll and the length of tubing that holds the toilet paper roll to the stand is crooked. Looks chep.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: There is no wall paper holder in the bathroom. I had been placing the paper on the side of the tub and loosing some over the side. This holder is weighted and stands anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower seed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the "softness" category above was referring to...lol! But I can verify that this product is sturdy and looks great in my bathroom! And, of course, holds the toilet tissue paper effectively!
customer_reviews.author: PJPG

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great color, design and look. The only thing I would improve is the base could be a little heavier so it doesn't tip as much. However, for my tiny bathroom with brand new tile walls that we just couldn't drill into yet, it works perfectly. Without it my toilet paper would sit on the sink or windowsill. It all matches all my brushed nickel accents and the industrial theme.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: Solid PT Holder
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid feeling toilet paper stand. Doesn’t rattle and wobble on the floor like cheaper models. The base is VERY solid. Came with an Allen key to assemble the one bolt it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: This had rust on it within the first month of using. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great price and really nice looking! It comes with the tool to put it together, which takes all of about 10 seconds. Super stoked on this! It’s heavy, so it won’t be easily knocked over by a person or pet and it seems to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: LaurindaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this. It looks so great, like, really rich (no offense to anyone) and is sturdy and absolutely well made. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with how sturdy this is given the price. Base is wide and heavy - we’ve had no issues with wobbling despite this being used by a four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish and superb delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Would definitely by again or for a friend in need. Keep up the excellence. Blessings continue in Jesus Name.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hanneken

customer_reviews.title: Its very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a free standing toilet paper towel holder after remodeling my bathroom. I wanted something simple and sturdy and this is exactly what it is. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.text: We opted for these because we didn't want to screw into our brand new vanities, and I'm glad we did! They were easy to assemble, very sturdy and durable, and I love the easy of getting to move it around whenever I want to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Easy to assemble. This was sturdy enough to hold the commercial size toilet paper since that is all I could find during the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: EVDuharte

customer_reviews.title: Just remodeled our power room. I did not want ...
customer_reviews.text: Just remodeled our power room. I did not want to put holes in the new cabinet or walls. Picked this TP holder because of the rectangular base. It goes with the new bath décor perfectly and no problems with the roll pulling off the arm. Got it quickly and no problems with the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Ellenjuice

customer_reviews.title: loose horizonal TP holder bar from factory
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and two are better than fine and I like them. One has aloose connection at the joint between the the vertical rod and the bar that actually holds the roll. I can see the screw wobbling around in the saddle of the vertical piece but I need instruction to repair. The return window closed three days ago. We diserve better than this.
customer_reviews.author: DeMo

customer_reviews.title: It’s a two-handed operation
customer_reviews.text: It works well with two hands. Not so well with one. I wish it were heavier because it usually tries to fall over when tearing off paper. Also, it would be great to have a flip up thingy on the end of the paper holder to keep the roll from flying off.
customer_reviews.author: W. Towers

customer_reviews.title: This one works great. I think for the price you won't find ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many of these--most of which were MUCH more expensive than this one. This one works great. I think for the price you won't find anything better. The height is perfect to sit next to the toilet and it is plenty heavy. I just wish they made this with a square on the end instead of a circle to keep with the angular look of the base.
customer_reviews.author: OC mana

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: This toilet tissue holder is modern looking with sleek clean lines. It was easy to assemble. My only complaint is that it is not very tall, so the tissue paper is held at an awkward height. It should be at least 7 inches taller
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and sleek
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper holder has shiny chrome that looks really nice. The base is heavy and has a grippy foam bottom so it doesn't move, toilet paper rolls are held in place by the stem connecting it to the base as well as little piece at the end, and it's easy to change rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Marceline

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but.
customer_reviews.text: It was shorter than what I expected. Make sure you use a tape measure before you buy to know how tall this is. Maybe it will be a 5 star for you. For me, a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Armas

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser works (got it because we couldn't find regular tp due to pandemic). I wish it had some way of tearing off the tp, but that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Garett

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but the best I have so far
customer_reviews.text: Need a toilet paper stand because I don't want to drill holes on my brand new bathroom. Better than the ones I got from BBB and Target. I just hope it could be higher and the pole wouldn't get loose from the base from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K.

customer_reviews.title: Wow the price, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the price, I was hesitant to order, thinking it is overpriced just to hold TP!!! However, it is built extremely well and has a hefty weight so it does not topple over when trying to get TP. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reed

product_meta.title: Gatco 1443SN Modern Square Base Toilet Paper Holder Stand with Storage, Satin Nickel, 21.13"H
product_meta.description:
Color:Satin Nickel| Style:With StorageGatco introduces our stand-alone bath tissue holder with toilet paper storage. This sturdy slim floor standing design can be placed on any floor surface including tile, hardwood, and carpet. Perfect space-saving organizing alternative to a shelf, rack, or canister. Enjoy easy drill free installation, leaving your walls damage free. This dispenser allows the flexibility of placing toilet paper or hand towels anywhere most convenient and aesthetically fitting in your modern, industrial, or traditional bathroom. Features extra space for toilet paper roll storage. Stands 21.13 inches tall, big enough to fit a total of five toilet paper rolls. Our products are made of high-quality metal to insure decades of reliable use. Adorn your bathroom with four luxurious finish options- chrome, matte black, brushed brass, and satin nickel. All our products are covered under Gatco’s 100-year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Since 1977, Gatco has been a leader in designing and manufacturing premium luxury bathware. Backed by our lifetime warranty, you can trust our products to always exceed your expectations and live up to their name. We proudly stand by our TRUE DESIGN and COMMITMENT TO EXCELLENCE.
feature_bullets: Accent your bathroom with the perfect combination of style and craft. Gatco Freestanding Tissue Holders are uniquely designed to bring the convenience of a freestanding, pedestal-style holder with modern decorative style to show off your luxury home.
Beautifully handcrafted and elegantly hand polished contemporary design.
Features high caliber metalwork for durability, dependability, resistance to rust, corrosion, and scratching.
Add luxury to your bathroom or shower room with ease- requires no drilling or installation.
Heavy duty: Weighted and padded rectangular base and capped dowel allows for added sturdiness and stability.
Single post is compatible with one jumbo, mega, large, or regular size toilet paper roll.
Pivoting top allows for reserve storage of up to four additional toilet paper rolls.
Available in a variety of finishes including- chrome, satin nickel, matte black, and brushed brass.
Ensuring our excellence, Gatco products include a 100-year warranty.
